edu.cs495.engine.game.satcollision

Class CollisionEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cs495.engine.game.satcollision.CollisionEvent

  • public class CollisionEvent
extends java.lang.Object
    This models the result of a collision and provides useful information to the invoked physical object
    Version:
    February 2019
    Author:
    Spencer Imbleau

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static CollisionEvent NO_COLLISION
      A collision event used to indicate there was no collision

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description

      Create a collision event package for data sending

    • Constructor Detail

      • CollisionEvent

        public CollisionEvent(AbstractPhysicalGameObject force,
                      double theta,
                      double magnitude)
        Create a collision event package for data sending
        Parameters:
        force - - the object which caused the collision
        theta - - the angle (in radians) of direction of the force
        magnitude - - the power of the force

    • Method Detail

      • getForce

        public AbstractPhysicalGameObject getForce()
        Get the force which caused the collision
        Returns:
        the physical object which invoked collision

      • getPulseTheta

        public double getPulseTheta()
        Get the direction of collision
        Returns:
        an angle theta in radians which corresponds to the direction of collision

        Return the magnitude of the collision
